languages.text: Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}
languages.original_text: При получении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от навигатора противник также получает эффект периодического урона, который наносит ему урон в конце каждого хода до конца боя. Этот урон составляет 20% от всего урона, который этот противник получил от навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} (10): первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за ход не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует времени на восстановление этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит +10 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} самому навигатору. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} (6): противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают штраф −6 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} −15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}

traits.locale_text: Enemies that suffer damage from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. Devastating 10: the first use of a damaging Navigator power does not set the power on cooldown. The second use of a damaging Navigator power will deal an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 direct damage to the Navigator. Castigating 6: enemies targeted by Navigator powers gain a −6 penalty to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is renewed every time the same enemy becomes the target of Navigator powers. +25 Willpower +25 Perception −15 Toughness

Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}

Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}

languages.text: 所有受到导航者{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的敌人，都会获得持续伤害效果，在回合结束时承受伤害，效果持续至战斗结束。该持续伤害等同于导航者对该名敌人造成伤害总值的20%。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}（10）：每回合首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}，也不会计入每回合攻击上限。同一回合中再次使用该能力，或使用其他攻击性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成10点伤害，导航者本人也会承受10点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}（6）：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低6点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g} −15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}

traits.locale_text: 所有受到导航者伤害的敌人，都会获得持续伤害{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时承受伤害，效果持续至战斗结束。该持续伤害等同于导航者对该名敌人造成伤害总值的20%。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}10：首次使用伤害性的导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。第二次使用伤害性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成10点伤害，导航者本人也会承受10点直击伤害。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}6：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有属性降低6点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会相应延长。 +25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g} −15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}

所有受到导航者{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的敌人，都会获得持续伤害效果，在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时承受伤害，{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}持续至战斗结束。该持续伤害等同于导航者对该名敌人造成伤害总值的20%。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}（10）：每回合首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}，也不会计入每回合攻击上限。同一回合中再次使用该能力，或使用其他攻击性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成10点伤害，导航者本人也会承受10点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}（6）：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低6点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +25{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g} −15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}

languages.text: 航宙士からの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた敵はターン終了時にその敵にダメージを与えるダメージ時間経過効果を戦闘が終了するまで受ける。そのダメージは航宙士から受けた全てのダメージの20%に相当する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}廃滅{/g}（10）：ターン毎、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、全てのターゲットに対し追加ダメージ+10、および航宙士に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}10を与える。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}非難{/g}（6）：航宙士の力の標的となった敵は航宙士の次のターン終了時まで全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対してペナルティ−6が付与される。このペナルティは累積し、同じ敵が航宙士の力の標的となるたびに更新される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+25増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+25増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}が-15減少
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}

traits.locale_text: 航宙士からの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた敵は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時にその敵にダメージを与えるダメージ時間経過効果を戦闘が終了するまで受ける。そのダメージは航宙士から受けた全てのダメージの20%に相当する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}廃滅{/g}10：ターン毎、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、全てのターゲットに対し追加ダメージ+10、および航宙士に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}10を与える。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}非難{/g}6：航宙士の力の標的となった敵は航宙士の次のターン終了時まで全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−6が付与される。このペナルティは累積し、同じ敵が航宙士の力の標的となるたびに更新される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+25増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+25増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}が+15減少

languages.text: Los enemigos que sufren {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del navegante también reciben un efecto de daño por tiempo que se aplica al final de su turno hasta el final del combate. El daño es igual al 20 % de todo el daño que han sufrido a manos del navegante. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastación{/g} (10): El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada turno no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige +10 de daño adicional a todos los objetivos y 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al navegante. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigo{/g} (6): Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una penalización de −6 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante. Esta penalización se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica. +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} −15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos que sufren daño del navegante también reciben un {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}efecto{/g} de daño por tiempo que se aplica al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} hasta el final del combate. El daño es igual al 20 % de todo el daño que han sufrido a manos del navegante. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastación{/g} 10: El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada turno no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige +10 de daño adicional a todos los objetivos y 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al navegante. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigo{/g} 6: Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −6 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante. Esta penalización es acumulativa y se renueva cada vez que el enemigo es objetivo de los poderes del navegante. +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} −15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}

languages.text: При получении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от навигатора противник также получает эффект периодического урона, который наносит ему урон в конце каждого хода до конца боя. Этот урон составляет 20% от всего урона, который этот противник получил от навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} (10): первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за ход не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует времени на восстановление этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит +10 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} самому навигатору. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} (6): противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают штраф −6 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} −15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}

traits.locale_text: При получении урона от навигатора противник также получает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} периодического урона, который наносит ему урон в конце каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} до конца боя. Этот урон составляет 20% от всего урона, который этот противник получил от навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} 10: после первого использования наносящей урон силы навигатора не требуется период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g}. Второе использование наносящей урон силы навигатора наносит +10 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 10 прямого урона самому навигатору. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} 6: противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −6 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего хода навигатора. Когда целью становится тот же самый противник, штраф суммируется, а его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} −15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}

При получении урона от навигатора противник также получает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} периодического урона, который наносит ему урон в конце каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} до конца боя. Этот урон составляет 20% от всего урона, который этот противник получил от навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} 10: после первого использования наносящей урон силы навигатора не требуется период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g}. Второе использование наносящей урон силы навигатора наносит +10 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 10 прямого урона самому навигатору. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} 6: противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −6 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего хода навигатора. Когда целью становится тот же самый противник, штраф суммируется, а его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} −15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}

languages.text: Feinde, die durch den Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleiden, erhalten einen Schaden über Zeit-Effekt, der ihnen bis zum Ende des Kampfes am Ende ihres Zuges Schaden zufügt. Der Schaden entspricht 20 % des gesamten Schadens, den sie durch den Navigator erlitten haben. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g} (10): Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und fließt nicht in das Angriffslimit pro Zug ein. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlich +10 Schaden und dem Navigator 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Geißelnd{/g} (6): Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erleiden bis zum Ende des nächsten Zuges des Navigators einen Abzug von −6 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Abzug ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die durch den Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleiden, erhalten außerdem einen Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt, der ihnen bis zum Ende des Kampfes am Ende ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} Schaden zufügt. Der Schaden entspricht 20 % des gesamten Schadens, den sie durch den Navigator erlitten haben. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g} 10: Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro Zug. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlich +10 Schaden und dem Navigator 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Geißelnd{/g} 6: Feinde, die von Navigatorkräften anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten Zugs des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −6 auf alle ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Abzug ist stapelbar und wird jedes Mal erneuert, wenn derselbe Feind zum Ziel von Navigatorkräften wird. <indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} <indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} <indent=5%>−15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}

languages.text: Les ennemis auxquels le navigateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subissent également un effet de dégâts progressifs qui leur fait subir des dégâts supplémentaires au terme de leur tour et jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ces dégâts correspondent à 20 % de tous les dégâts qui leur ont été infligés par le navigateur. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} 10 : à chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du navigateur au cours du même tour inflige +10 points de dégâts supplémentaires à toutes les cibles et 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} au navigateur. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Fustigation{/g} 6 : les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur subissent une pénalité de −6 jusqu'à la fin de son tour suivant. Cette pénalité est cumulable et est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur à chaque fois qu'elle se cumule. +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis auxquels le navigateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subissent également un effet de dégâts progressifs qui leur fait subir des dégâts supplémentaires au terme de leur tour et jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ces dégâts correspondent à 20 % de tous les dégâts qui leur ont été infligés par le navigateur. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} 10 : à chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du navigateur au cours du même tour inflige +10 points de dégâts supplémentaires à toutes les cibles et 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} au navigateur. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Fustigation{/g} 6 : les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur subissent une pénalité de −6 jusqu'à la fin de son tour suivant. Cette pénalité est cumulable et est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur à chaque fois qu'elle se cumule. +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}

languages.text: Rotacı'dan {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alan düşmanlar, zamanla hasar veren bir etkiye maruz kalırlar. Bu etki, her turun sonunda onlara hasar verir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Hasar miktarı, Rotacı'dan aldıkları tüm hasarın %20'sine eşittir. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Yıkıcı{/g} (10): Saldırı amaçlı bir Rotacı gücünün bir turdaki ilk kullanımı, gücü {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresine{/g} sokmaz ve tur başına saldırı sınırından sayılmaz. Aynı turda bu gücün ikinci kez veya saldırı amaçlı başka bir Rotacı gücünün kullanımı, tüm hedeflere +10 ilave hasar verirken Rotacı da 10 puan {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalır. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Kırbaçlayıcı{/g} (6): Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı düşmanlar, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} −6 ceza puanı alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turunun sonuna dek sürer. Bu ceza puanı üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g}
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}
